explains: n. 麻疹，风疹；（家畜）囊尾蚴病
wordGroup: measles vaccine n. [免疫学]麻疹疫苗；麻疹
german measles [医]风疹（又称德国麻疹）

sentences.en: Adults are often immune to German measles.
sentences.cn: 成人往往对风疹有免疫力。

sentences.en: Rubella is just another name for German measles.
sentences.cn: 风疹只是德国麻疹的另一个名称。

sentences.en: Encephalitis still attacks one child in 1,000 who catches measles.
sentences.cn: 每1000位患麻疹的儿童中仍会有一位患上脑炎。
